animatedlist



class AnimatedList;
Holds a list of Boom style texture animations and switch texture definitions.

See http://doomwiki.org/wiki/ANIMATED and http://doomwiki.org/wiki/SWITCHES for more information about these lumps and their format.

DuplicateList readFrom(WAD wad);
Reads animated textures and switch textures from a WAD file.

Params:
WAD wad The WAD file to read animations and switches from.

void addTo(WAD wad);
Writes an ANIMATED and SWITCHES lump containing the animations and switches in this list to a WAD file.

Params:
WAD wad The WAD file to add the lumps to.
